name: WP Remove Version Number
author: EastSide Code

sections.description:
This WordPress Plugin removes the version number from the WordPress front end. This is important for security purposes as hackers will usually try to identify the current version number your site it running in order to take advantage of any security issues associated with that version.

Major features in WP Remove Version Number include:

  • Removes version number from scripts, styles, and rss feed.
  • No setup required!
sections.installation: Upload the “wp-remove-version-number” folder to your wp-content/plugins directory, then Activate it.

short_description: License: GPLv2 or later WordPress plugin to remove the version number from the WordPress front end.
